title: Eric "Champion of Women" Schneiderman Falls to the Me Too Movement | Jon Meacham
itunes:title: Eric "Champion of Women" Schneiderman Falls to the Me Too Movement | Jon Meacham
description:
President Trump ditches the Iran nuclear deal, New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman resigns amid sexual abuse claims, and Jon Meacham discusses "The Soul of America."
